answers.answer: I've been induced with all four of my previous and most likely will with this one. I have high blood pressure resulting in preeclampsia. The way I had been induced the first time was by a pill or up by the cervix to soften and open it. Being to lay in bed while waiting. The rest were done by iv medicines, I don't know any different then to be induced. You still go thru the same labor pains water breaking and delivery so it works for me.
I've been induced with inducing gel. It jus felt like bad cramps. But I've heard if they give u pictocin that's the worst
Pricing is what I had in the iv. I prefer to let my water break on its own because contractions hurt more after it busts. Other then that I would think it was the same as any other labor.

question: Hey moms I have 9 days until my due date and really didn't want to be induced but today at the doctor they told me they are going to induce me next Tuesday due to growth restriction.  My princess is growing but my stomach isn't. She's already head down and basically in the birth canal.  I'm 2cm dilated and starting to thin out. I was wondering have anyone been induced ? If so what is it like ?
title: induction .
